name: MQ2
description: Gas sensor detecting LPG, CO, and smoke.
notes: Requires calibration. Power at 5V; output is compatible with 3.3V.
connections:
MQ-2 → Raspberry Pi Pico Wiring:

MQ-2 Pin | Pico Pin
---------|---------
VCC      | 5V (external or USB VIN)
GND      | GND
AO       | GP26 (ADC0)
DO       | GP15 (or any free GPIO)

Notes:
- MQ-2 requires 5V for heating element.
- Pico logic level is 3.3V — AO and DO are safe.
- Use AO for analog gas level, DO for threshold detection.
